attributes.action: Recoup overpaid expences of MPs. standing down from their resettlement payment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some members of parliament are standing down at the next election and under the current rules do not have to pay back their illgotten expences, this is not acceptable to the British public and should be changed

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
